body.name: Tyler DIVA Glamorous Wash Laundry Detergent- 1/2 Gallon - With Olivi Stain Remover Pen - Fresh Scented Sachet - Laundry Detergent - For Washing Clothes, Linen, Lingerie, Expensive Fabric, Sheets
features: LUXURIOUSLY CLEANSING LAUNDRY DETERGENT -Treat your wardrobe and linen to the all-day refreshing power of DIVA Wash! This luxurious detergent is safe for all washers and gentle on sensitive on skin.
BONUS STAIN REMOVER PEN & SCENTED SACHET - We've made it easier to keep your important clothing fresh and stain-free. Includes a FREE BONUS Olivi stain remover pen for instant on-the-spot treatment.
GENTLE ON DELICATE & SPECIALTY FABRICS - Choose DIVA Glamorous Wash. Tyler detergent is supremely gentle and ideal for washing delicate linens & fabrics, lingerie, high thread-count sheets etc.
ELIMINATES TOUGH STAINS - DIVA detergent is designed to clean all fabrics and remove even the toughest stains. For maximum effectiveness, pre-treat stains directly with detergent, then wash on Warm.
LONG-LASTING FRAGRANCE - Enjoy a long-lasting fragrance that will fill the space with a refreshing aroma when you pull your laundry from the dryer. Infuse your outfits with Tyler's soothing scents.
body.description: Bring fantastic freshness, soothing fragrance and long-lasting comfort to clothes, linens and towels with Tyler DIVA Glamorous Wash! Carefully formulated to offer deep, powerful cleaning results while still remaining gentle on delicate and expensive fabrics. Your wardrobe has never looked – or smelled – so good!PRODUCT FEATURES:Fine liquid laundry detergentMachine wash and handwash safeFresh soothing fragranceLong-lasting cleanlinessTough on stains, grease and oilsGentle on sensitive skinFor delicate and normal fabricsBONUS Olivi Stain Removal PenBETTER THAN LEADING LIQUID DETERGENTSDIVA Glamorous Wash is made with superior ingredients and crafted with a soothing aromatic profile that offers a natural, non-chemical fragrance to your freshly laundered clothes and linens.BETTER THAN LEADING POWDER DETERGENTSPowder detergents are messy and can create an airborne hazard when mishandled. Unlike DIVA Glamorous Wash, even the most powerful powder detergents can’t be used to pre-treat spots & stains.KEEPS COLORS BRIGHT AND PREVENTS FADINGYou’ll never have to worry about fading those subtle hues and perfect shades of color in your wardrobe. Tyler detergent is meticulously crafted to improve the quality of your important fabrics – never ruin them. Unlike harsher chemical-based retail brands, our luxurious detergent keeps your whites bright and prevents fading across the entire color spectrum.SOFT ON SKINGot sensitive skin? Don’t worry! Your hands are in the right hands. DIVA Glamorous Wash keeps all things glamorous and is supremely soothing. Perfect for handwashing.Don’t take any chances – give your wardrobe and linen closet the DIVA treatment!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells wonderful but loud to some
reviews.reviewText: I loved the smell of the detergent. However, the smell is loud so be careful how much you put in a load.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great laundry detergent!
reviews.reviewText: Does not leave soap lines. Removes stains and makes my clothes smell amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best laundry detergent
reviews.reviewText: Smells SOOOO good!!! Makes your clothes soft and smell absolutely amazing!!! A little bit, like a cap full, goes a long ways!! Doesn’t take much at all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the smell of my sweaters
reviews.reviewText: Love smelling good, with Diva to wash my sheets too... I feel like a Diva even at 76 years beautiful 🥰

reviews.reviewerName: Definitely a great case! Keeps my AirPods safe and snug and it's made very well.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The smell is DELICIOUS!
reviews.reviewText: This smell is so enchanting. It stays on clothes in my closet for months if not re washed. I have bought this over and over again. Pricey, but you really get what you pay for with this! People stop me at work and ask me what the scent is!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does what it says
reviews.reviewText: I love the fragrance, it meets my expectations to a T. A little goes along way and my clothes, linens and rugs smell amazing. Add it with my laundry soap, you will love it too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars In love and obsessed...wanna feel boujee?? Order this stuff
reviews.reviewText: I took one star away as the pen I received was broken and the scent sachet was not very scented so I ended up adding a bit of detergent to the balls to jazz it up. The tip of the stain remover pen popped off immediately which bummed me out as my son had a stain on his favorite sweater and I had just received my order so I told him no worries, I can get it out only to find out the pen was defective. I ended up opening it up and manually spreading some of the liquid around and to me, it seemed like it was just more of the detergent! Did nothing to remove the stain which is whatever as I ordered the set for the detergent. Might want to check quality of the pens you're sending out, maybe they're expired or something and not worth the extra work! Detergent is good enough as is, smells so heavenly and my husband is even a believer now! I have given little samples to my besties and they all agree, it smells BOMB! I feel so boujee when I get dressed and I love how it makes my whole house smell lovely during washing. Im just sad I never heard about this stuff before! I also ordered High Maintenance and was less than thrilled, nothing at all compared to Diva! Never stop making this stuff, my husband told me to start ordering gallons of it lol. Hes a chef so his work clothes smell like food and its always been a struggle to lift the odors but Diva has done the trick! A capful and 1/2 and we're in business!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's worth it
